name: Spacious room, near transit, keyless self check-in
description:
Comfortable, spacious private room with high ceiling in the quiet Boston neighborhood of Hyde Park. Convenient location, walk to MBTA Fairmount Station. This room has 210 square footage and is on the first floor of a smoke-free multi-family house, comes with a queen size bed, hardwood floor, air conditioning, keyless self check-in, personal fridge inside your room and no sharing with other guests. Shared bathroom, living room and kitchen. Also enjoy fast Gig Internet in the house.

The space
Easy access to downtown Boston, 5-7 minute walk to the Fairmount train stop, Fairmount is Commuter Rail Zone 1A station, it takes about 25 minutes to get to downtown South Station, if you have a 1-day, 7-day or monthly LinkPass CharlieTicket, it is valid at Fairmount station, monthly Pass costs $90, you can also pay cash on the train, the fare of $2.40 per ride.
